sentences.en: a course on developing presentational skills
Further to your letter, I agree that there are some presentational problems, politically speaking.
sentences.cn: 正如贵方信中所提到的，我也认为从政治角度来说，有一些词语表意上的问题。

sentences.en: In a 4 th study, authors investigated the susceptibility of the SC - IAT to faking or self - presentational concerns.
sentences.cn: 在第4个研究中, 作者调查了SC-IAT在伪造或 自我 陈述关注时的易感性.

sentences.en: Its presentational feature is development of structure and enrichment of granule xenomorphic sulfides.
sentences.cn: 其表象特征为构造发育,细粒他形硫化物富集.

words.tran_cn: 直示的，直接表示概念的
体面地，可上场面地；像样地
存在；出席；参加；风度；仪态
提出者；推荐者；赠送者；任命者
表象的；演出的；上演的；直觉的

trans.tran_en: connected with the act of showing, explaining or offering sth to other people, especially a new product, a policy or a performance
